name: Hannes Kaufmann
content: Mag. Dr. Hannes Kaufmann • Interactive Media Systems, TU Wien ATTENTION: This is a web archive! The IMS Group was split up in 2018 and does not exist anymore. Recent work of former members can be found at the VR/AR Group and the Computer Vision Group. Contact E-Mail hannes.kaufmann@tuwien.ac.at Website www.ims.tuwien.ac.at/~kaufmann Office 1040 Wien, Favoritenstrasse 9 • Room HD0405 • Map Office Hours By Appointment Phone +43-1-58801-18860 Fax +43-1-58801-18898 Research Interests (Mobile) Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality Real-time ray-tracing for AR "Holodeck Technologies" & Interfaces (Redirected Walking, Haptic Feedback,...) Tracking Technologies and Applications Wide Area Tracking Motion Capture Psychological topics in AR (Cyberpsychology) Education in Augmented Reality Medical Applications of VR/AR 3D User Interface Design AR/VR and CAD Integration Theses PhD thesis on Geometry Education with Augmented Reality. Habilitation on Applications of Mixed Reality. Book webpage. Recent Awards Winner of the Futurezone Award in the category "Smart Invention"3rd Place at TUN Price 2016Nominee of the Houska Price 2015.Winner of the INiTS Award 2013.Winner of the Kardinal-Innitzer-Förderpreis 2013.Best Paper Award “Autonomous Flight using a Smartphone as On-Board Processing Unit in GPS-Denied Environments”, 11th International Conference on Advances in Mobile Computing & Multimedia, 2013.
